announcement:
Codeless Backtesting/Minute Data


We have added UI driven backtesting to expedite backesting process. Now, you can choose trading conditions, resolution and other settings with just a few clicks.

  1. Multiple Technical Indicators
  2. Minute Resolution Data
  3. Free 20 Backtests Everyday


We hope you enjoy the new backtester. If you need any help, face any issues or have any feature request, write us at shiv.chawla@aimsquant.com
